column1: 212316,Stage Manager,,"Manage operations of artistic or entertainment departments or organisations
column3: Coordinate logistics for productions or events
column5: Collaborate with others to determine technical details of productions
column7: Manage content of broadcasts or presentations
column9: Supervise technical operations of production to ensure creative direction is realised
column11: Collaborate with others to prepare or perform artistic productions
column21: Operate control consoles for sound, lighting or video
column23: Distribute materials to employees or customers
column25: Discuss production content and progress with others
column29: Study scripts to determine project requirements
column31: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
column35: Move and store materials, equipment or products
column43: Determine operational compliance with regulations or standards
